    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SemanticAnalyzer.HtmlObject
      The Class HtmlObject is a holder of the information needed from the html tags and text.
      static class  SemanticAnalyzer.HtmlType
      The Enum HtmlType that is used to set the HtmlObject to a certian type.
      class  SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject
      The Class MkdObject used as a holder of information about a type of Mkd tag or token.
      static class  SemanticAnalyzer.MkdType
      The Enum MkdType used to set the MkdObjects to a certain type.
      class  SemanticAnalyzer.ScopeKey
      The Class ScopeKey.
      class  SemanticAnalyzer.SemanticException
      The Class SemanticException.

      • translateMacroStack

        private java.util.Stack<SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject> translateMacroStack(java.util.Stack<SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject> initialStack)
        Translates the mkd stack to find and replace all of the macro notations with their proper values. Uses the helper method of checkAllScopes to find the proper value for each macro.
        Parameters:
        initialStack - the initial stack with macro notations
        Returns:
        the final translated stack

      • checkAllScopes

        public SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject checkAllScopes(SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject name,
                                        java.util.Stack<SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject> scopes,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,SemanticAnalyzer.MkdObject> nameValues)
        Checks all of the current scopes stored in the namevalues table. Uses the table to translate a given macro name into a value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the use macro
        scopes - the stack of current scopes
        nameValues - the name value pairs stored in a hashMap
        Returns:
        the mkd object that contains the translated macro information

      • translateMkdToHtml

        private void translateMkdToHtml()
        Translate mkd to html. Takes the mkdStack and converts it to html code using the conversion table.

      • htmlStackToString

        private java.lang.String htmlStackToString()
        Converts the translated html stack to a string which will eventually be written out to a file.
        Returns:
        the string of compiled file contents
